name: Penguin Flood
description:
Penguin Flood

🐧Penguin Flood is a mobile casual game.

You are an eskimo avoiding penguins who rushing in the water.
☠️If you fall in the water, you die.

Less penguins touched is more combo.
💥If you collide with one you loose all the combo.
⏲️Each seconds you earn points based on your combo.

Care there is multiple fierce penguins
   The baby
  The big one
  The bumper
  The kamikaze
  The golden Snitch (Nice one)

Let me know what you liked and what you disliked.
You can share what you will loved to see in the game.

Have fun !

Contact

Hello, I am Timothée Fermeaux, a developer.
